scripts.cy:run: npm run prereport &&  npx cypress run
scripts.cy:run_qa: CYPRESS_BASE_URL=https://staging.app.com npx cypress run --env configFile=qa --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run_qa:smoke: CYPRESS_BASE_URL=https://staging.app.com npx cypress run --env configFile=qa,grepTags=smoke --browser chrome
scripts.cy:e2e: npm run cy:run; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
